original_title: تجيبها كده تجيلها كده هي كده
overview: Ezzat and Hassan are friends and co-workers. Hassan admires Soad but he can't tell her about his feelings because of his shyness. He asks his friend Ezzat to tell her instead, but things don't go as expected. Ezzat also receives letters from an unknown person threatening to kill him.
title: Whatever You Do, It's Always That Way
